H0.text: Who rose from Prime Minister (19221924) to President (19251928), and on 1 September 1928 was crowned King and declared Field Marshal of the Royal Army, proclaiming a constitutional monarchy. Ahmed Zahir

H1.text: Who rose from Prime Minister (19221924) to President (19251928), and on 1 September 1928 was crowned King and declared Field Marshal of the Royal Army, proclaiming a constitutional monarchy. Reza Shah

H2.text: Who rose from Prime Minister (19221924) to President (19251928), and on 1 September 1928 was crowned King and declared Field Marshal of the Royal Army, proclaiming a constitutional monarchy. Alexander I of Yugoslavia

H3.text: Who rose from Prime Minister (19221924) to President (19251928), and on 1 September 1928 was crowned King and declared Field Marshal of the Royal Army, proclaiming a constitutional monarchy. Zogu

A4.text: At age 27, he first served as Albania's youngest ever Prime Minister (1922–1924), then as president (1925–1928), and finally as King (1928–1939).

A5.text: Zogu was officially elected as the first President of Albania by the Constituent Assembly on 21 January 1925, taking office on 1 February for a seven-year term.
